Dynamic Mapping API

Summary

Headers
Predix-Zone-Id: 785aabb0-a626-47a1-837c-78b3dba266eb
X-Subtenant-Id: subtenant1
Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzI..
Content-Type: application/json
Endpoints
BASIC       https://dynamic-mapping-prod.run.aws-usw02-pr.ice.predix.io/v1/..
SELECT    https://dynamic-mapping-prod.run.asv-pr.ice.predix.io/v1/..
Add an Asset History Location
PUT ..v1/collections/trucks/assets/truck01
BODY
{
"location":[0.1186273,52.2404057],
"timestamp": "2016-11-14T10:20:50.52Z",
"retain_history": true
}
Update an Asset Location
PUT ..v1/collections/trucks/assets/truck01
BODY
{
"location":[0.1186273,52.2404057],
"timestamp": "2016-11-14T10:20:50.52Z",
"retain_history": false,
"meta_data": {"class": "heavy", "type": "tank truck", "colour": "red"}
}
Get Latest Asset Location
GET ..v1/collections/trucks/assets/truck01
List All Collections
GET ..v1/collections
Get a List of all Assets in a Collection
GET ..v1/collections/trucks
Delete a Collection
DELETE ..v1/collections/trucks
Delete an Asset and All of its Locations
DELETE ..v1/collections/trucks/assets/truck01
Get Asset Locations within a 2 hour period
POST ..v1/collections/trucks/assets/truck01/query?type=timeperiod
BODY
{
"start": "2016-11-14T08:20:50.52Z",
"end": "2016-11-14T10:20:50.52Z"
}
Get 5 Latest asset Locations
POST ..v1/collections/trucks/assets/truck01/query?type=latest
BODY
{
"limit": 5
}
Get Asset Locations within 2 hours within Bounding box
POST ..v1/collections/trucks/assets/truck01/query?type=bbox
BODY
{
"start": "2016-11-14T08:20:50.52Z",
"end": "2016-11-14T10:20:50.52Z",
"bbox": {
"left": 0.1186273,
"right":0.1456344,
"top":50.2404057,
"bottom":53.2404057
}
}
Find all assets in a collection within a bounding box
GET ..v1/collections/trucks/spatial-query/bbox-interacts?left=0&right=4&bottom=46&top=50
Cluster assets within a collection
GET ..v1/collections/trucks/cluster?left=0&right=4&bottom=46&top=50&dataQuery={"class": "heavy", "type": "tank truck"}
